alert.note: Alert for Missoula, Bitterroot Valleys (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued October 23 at 1:40PM MDT until October 26 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH IN EFFECT FROM LATE TUESDAY NIGHT THROUGH THURSDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy snow possible. Flash freeze possible Wednesday morning. Total snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches possible, locally higher. Northeast wind 10 to 25 mph. Higher wind speeds to 35 mph in Hellgate Canyon. * WHERE...Missoula/Bitterroot Valleys. * WHEN...From late Tuesday night through Thursday morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning and evening commutes.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
